Sub: Circulation of intelligence input on social media platform

It has been observed that confidential and secret communication sent via
emailfax message, are being shared / forwarded indiscriminately across various
whatsapp groups of Formations/Units of CISF. A recent alert message sent for action by
DAE & DoS/APS/SS is a case in point. The input shared by Int. Dte, was found circulated
in whatsapp groups and also published in print media alongwith the original message
containing instructions issued by FHQ. Indiscriminate dissemination of top
secret/confidential communication through whatsapp as a matter of habit & convenience
is highly detrimental to national security and seriously compromises with our security
preparedness

02. In this connection your attention is drawn to FHQ vide letter No No.IC-
17099/CISF/INT/ MAC/Inst/ SMP/2019/1350 dated May 16, 2019 regarding circulation of
intelligence inputs on social media platform and also ‘Guidelines on use of Social Media
by CISF personne!’ issued by Ops Dte vide FHQ letter No (3395) dated July 15, 2019,
which clearly mentions that screenshots or scanned copy of any Confidential/Secret
document, should not be sent/posted to any public domain (Copies enclosed).

03. However, the recent leakage of a secret document, clearly indicates that these
instructions are not being adhered to scrupulously by different formations/units. There is
also a possibility that such circulation is done intentionally by certain aggrieved /
mischievous/ disgruntled members of the force to malign image of the force

04, DG CISF has taken a serious view on the matter and has desired that utmost
secrecy and a secure transmission channels of such inputs must be maintained by all
formations/units, ADsG APS and North and all Sector IsG including Director/NISA must
sensitize the units within their respective jurisdiction to ensure that no such security
breach is repeated in the future and all force personnel strictly adhere to existing
instructions in this regard. Besides, suspected elements indulging in such undesirable
activities should be identified and exemplary action must be taken against wre

Sub: Circulation of intelligence input on social media platform : Req

Ithas been intimated by MAC/IB, that threat related inputs recently shared on
MAC platform, were circulated in various whatsapp groups by a certain agency. The
whatsapp message contained the original message along with the instructions issued
by the member agency to its formations. Such practices are highly detrimental to
national security and amount to gross breach of security instructions

02. As the inputs shared through MAC/IB are secret in nature and contain
sensitive information, its safe custody and secure transmission is of paramount
importance, Such inputs require appropriate care in their handling towards ensuring
that they do not reach to any unauthorized person

03. _Henee, it is requested to sensitize all Sector/Zonal DisG and unit commanders
under your jurisdiction to ensure security and secrecy of inputs of MAC/IB shared by
this Dte., by refraining from sharing them on various social media platform. Further
any deviation/breach in this regard, be thoroughly enquired into forthwith aiid brought
